sections.paragraph: a projecting roof, a landing, a thick beam, a plank, a threshold
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to cover; properly equivalent to H5645; but used only as an architectural term, an architrave (as shading the pillars): - thick (beam, plant).
